title: ContactsXL+&Twitterv6.8(2013)[wulfy1978]
description:
Category: Social Networking
Updated: Feb 02, 2013
Version: 6.8
Size: 6.3 MB
Languages: English, French, German, Spanish
Seller: jonathan tebo

Requirements: Compatible with iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad. Requires iOS 5.0 or later. This app is optimized for iPhone 5.


Description

ContactsXL for iPhone and iPad lets you manage your contacts, create groups, call your favorites by tapping their photo, quickly send SMS and Email to groups, get notified of your contacts' birthdays, delete the duplicates from your address book, backup your contacts, call using a T9 dialer, share custom contact cards, view your contact pictures in the contact list. And even more!

You can update your contacts with their profile pictures, birthdays and information from

Thank you all for your comments, they are just amazing!
